section.name: Support for Drag 'n Drop
section.p: Currently, FEST-Swing supports drag 'n drop for the following fixtures:
which simulate a user dragging 'n dropping in JLists, JTables and JTrees, respectively.

Note: FEST's drag 'n drop will effectively simulate a user pressing the left mouse button, moving the mouse to a particular location and releasing the mouse. However, it is up to you to implement drag 'n drop in you Swing components. To learn more drag 'n drop, please visit Sun's Swing Tutorial.
